name: Bengali Association of Minnesota (BAM)
address: Not publicly listed, but they organize events throughout Minnesota
description: A non-profit organization dedicated to preserving and cherishing the heritage, philosophy, culture, and traditions of Bengal. They organize various cultural events and activities

name: Bengali Cultural Society of Minnesota
address: Not publicly listed, but they organize events in the Twin Cities
description: This organization aims to preserve and promote the art and cultural heritage of the Bengali community in the Twin Cities through events and partnerships

name: SAATH - South Asian Arts & Theater House
address: 3748 Minnehaha Ave S, Minneapolis, MN 55406 (for classes)
description: SAATH builds community through Bollywood-inspired dance, theater, improv comedy, and other performing arts. They offer classes and performance opportunities

name: Indian Music Society of Minnesota (IMSOM)
description: IMSOM presents and promotes Indian classical music in the Twin Cities, fostering understanding and appreciation of India's cultural heritage

name: Mandala South Asian Performing Arts
address: Events held at various locations; 130 N. Jefferson St, Minneapolis, MN (for Primitive Gallery events)
description: Mandala celebrates tradition and innovation in South Asian performing arts, offering immersive experiences that engage multiple senses

name: Minnesota Orchestra
description: While not exclusively Bengali, the Minnesota Orchestra occasionally features performances that fuse South Indian classical music with Western traditions, such as the "Sarojini" production

name: Indus Music (part of Indian Cultural Association of Minnesota)
address: Events organized by Indian Cultural Association of Minnesota, PO Box 581846, Minneapolis, MN 55458
description: Indus Music is a professional band known for versatile performances spanning ghazals, Bollywood hits, and regional music, led by singers Fazel Haris and Gorinka

name: Bollywood Dance Scene (now SAATH)
address: Classes previously held at Threads and Hothouse; see SAATH for current information
description: Formerly known as Bollywood Dance Scene, this group evolved into SAATH, focusing on South Asian performing arts, including dance

name: RagaVahini Music Academy
address: Locations vary, with some online offerings
description: Offers Carnatic music vocal and veena lessons, indicating a focus on South Indian classical music which may involve ensemble performances

name: Various Indian / Bollywood Entertainment Providers (Gig Heaven)
description: This platform lists various Indian and Bollywood entertainers available for hire in Minneapolis, which may include musical groups or solo artists who perform Bengali music
